content:
Diagnosis:	Limited stage small cell carcinoma of esophagus

Management:	15 Jan 2024 - Commenced concurrent chemoradiotherapy
		4 cycles carboplatin/etoposide with radical radiotherapy 50Gy/25#

Histology:	Small cell carcinoma, Ki67 85%, regional nodal involvement

Current situation:	Pre cycle 4 carboplatin/etoposide

[redacted name] attended pre-chemotherapy assessment today. Treatment has been well tolerated with grade 1 esophagitis managed with regular analgesia. Recent CT shows excellent partial response with >50% reduction in primary tumor and resolution of previously involved nodes. Performance status remains 1. Blood parameters are satisfactory for proceeding with final cycle. Weight has stabilized at 72kg. Radiotherapy completed 2 weeks ago with good tolerance. Plan to proceed with cycle 4 today and arrange follow-up CT chest/abdomen at 4 weeks post completion of treatment.
